skillset.title: Programming Languages
skillset.skill: JavaScript (es6+, DOM, AJAX/fetch, react, node.js, Jasmine Unit Testing)

achievements.achievement: Created docker containers for node.js apps and worked with Kubernetes, performance, and seceral other teams to run the application in Azure Kubernetes(AKS)
Implemented express.js, node.js and REDIS server to call render server and serve up site
Learned how to look at Akamai config and discover things that needed to be fixed and ways to improve caching
Fixed memory leak in node.js render service to stabilize the node.js render service, for uptimes that extended the life of releases
Improve performance of the node.js render service, using node.js profiling tools, better memoize cache, smaller cache key, and make cache an LRU cache
Add custom monitoring statistics for node to track performance and metrics without overloading logs
Architect for Product Page 2017 and 2018 Enhancements, Community Enhancements, and Search Enhancements 2018 discoveries
Domain Architect for Online Reservations (OLR), ADA, Loyalty, and SEO for Canada and many other discoveries and projects
Created custom grunt plugins, and used existing grunt plugins to create new JavaScript build system for new Backbone.js, require.js, and jQuery modules
Wrote system architecture design document for responsive checkout, as well as acted as technical lead and architect for the project
Took training on jquery and node.js
Worked on SEO, security, performance, page weight, and integrating sonar code analysis of the UI JavaScript and JSP code

Gave training classes for maven, JavaScript and the Macy's minifier, the basics of maven, assisted in the JavaScript unit tests demo using jasmine framework, JavaScript design patterns, Handlebarsjs, browser performance, spiriting, refactoring, and the XSS - Script Injection and SQL Injection training classes
Developed and documented JavaScript, JSP, selenium testing framework, UI Architecture wiki, and HTML coding standards and AJAX best practices
Created designed and implemented for PDP and registry add to bag layers, "quickbag" layer, and shopping bag migration page
Enhanced and documented minifer and verify maven plugins
Implemented a QuickView feature on the web site and image fading
Worked on the Shop & Browse UI team using Java(Spring, JSP, Java), HTML, an CSS fixing defects and implementing international pricing display following agile methodology
Used Apache Lucene to work on a search engine
Programmed in HTML, CSS, JavaScript(YUI), Java(Spring, JSP, Java) and Oracle SQL fixing defects and implementing new features for healthline and healthline's clients
Used CSS, html, and JavaScript(jQuery) to create a web based medical application screens
Worked on the implementation of a web site for Monterey Hotels using the Groovy on Grails framework (Spring, Java, Jetty, Hibernate) and MySQL

Analyzed, designed, wrote use cases, interacted with the client's Lead Analysts (PG&E), wrote JUnit tests, and maintained screens for the team I was on (over 60 highly complex screens), plus several other teams for the software project rewrite, some being the most complicated and feature-rich screens in the application

Implemented and fixed numerous JavaScript, HTML, and CSS UI features, creating and using Java Tag Files and Yahoo! UI API's, for the web application including: the navigation menu, a tooltip widget, a tab-out component, a multi-selection dropdown, the global smart popup, printing issues, configuring data export from the application, and created the basis for the AJAX implementation that is used all over the CSI application

Worked as a front end and back end Java web developer during the rewrite of the PG&E gas transport system, demonstrating a strong competency and experience in J2EE/JEE, solid time management skills and excellent interpersonal and communication skills, in a fast-paced environment with a tight deadline

Exhibited great communication skills, both verbal and written to explain intricate technical issues and solutions concisely and clearly, to the team lead, the clients, and with regard to the task progress and overall schedule

Efficiently multitasked during the rewrite of the PG&E gas transmission application, obtaining, using and sharing technical and business knowledge to mentor other developers, while always still staying ahead of the project deadlines

Worked concurrently, professionally, as a team player with all the other consultants and trained new front-end developers on the frameworks of the project to ensure that the team consistently employed a unified development standard, and was often referred to as the go-to guy

Contributed to the Architecture Team, and was exposed to the common issues across the different functional teams, resulting in gaining a good understanding of the common business issues at the application level and then proceeded to develop framework-based solutions in addressing those issues including creating several custom tags
Used Enterprise Architect UML modeling and design tool to model screen and page flows in a web application and participated in the class modeling and message trace designs

job.jobtitle: Senior Programmer / Analyst - Research and Development

achievements.achievement: Designed, documented, implemented, enhanced, and supported the Java web based leasing application and web services, resulting in new clients and more projects with existing clients
Modified in-house server side DOM XML parser, written in C, used in the new web based leasing application
Created scripts to build and manage lease application databases and users for the port to Oracle 9i from Sybase, attracting new clients
Ported and benchmarked a leasing server application shell scripts and source code from HP-UX to HP-UX, Sun Solaris, and Redhat Linux
Maintained, modified, and created Perl-Sybase report scripts, templates and API for creating new reports to allow quick graphical access to view the performance of the advertisement system
Wrote web based advertising system monitoring tool with performance graphs in Perl, HTML and JavaScript
Modified, created and maintained internal advertisement serving programs using Perl, HTML and JavaScript
Enhanced and modified a financial application Web Based UI prototype, as well as programmed, debugged and maintained the client-server financial application
Modified client-server prototype for the Kansas Department of Revenue project
Examined and wrote summary of findings on patent applications for input devices, video displays, and display controllers, for the approval or denial of a patent
Analyzed aircraft electronic schematics to create and write story boards for graphical animation
